nodes.text: This Czerka sandcrawler was used by a Czerka mining team on Tatooine to traverse the Dune Sea. Tusken Raiders attacked the sandcrawler, immobilizing it and sending multiple waves of Tuskens to finish the team off. However Revan intervened and defended the mining team. They left the sandcrawler in the desert for the Jawas to scavenge so they could buy it back from them.
